hesml.taxonomy.impl

Class HalfEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.taxonomy.impl.HalfEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHalfEdge

    class HalfEdge
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHalfEdge
    This class implements a non-oriented edge as defined by the IHalfEdge interface. The IHalfEdge are the key object of our representation model for taxonomies called PosetHERep. The instances of IHalfEdge objects encode all adjacency relationships between vertexes within the taxonomy, as detailed in the paper below. Lastra-Díaz, J. J., and García-Serrano, A. (2016). HESML: a scalable ontology-based semantic similarity measures library with a set of reproducible experiments and a replication dataset. To Appear in Information Systems Journal.
    Author:
    Juan Lastra-Díaz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void destroy()
      This function disconnects the object during a clear call to the owner taxonomy.
      IEdge getEdge()
      This function returns the parent non-oriented edge.
      OrientedEdgeType getEdgeType()
      This function returns the type of edge
      IHalfEdge getNext()
      This function returns the next outcoming edge from the target vertex.
      IHalfEdge getOpposite()
      This function returns the paired and opposite oriented edge.
      IVertex getTarget()
      This function returns the target vertex pointed by the current half-edge.
      double getWeight()
      This function returns the weight value of this half-edge
      (package private) void setNext(IHalfEdge next)
      This function sets the next outcoming edge from the target vertex.
      (package private) void setOpposite(IHalfEdge opposite)
      This function sets the opposite edge, and it is only invoked by the owner non-oriented edge in order to connect both paired half-edges.
      void setWeight(double weight)
      This function sets the weight value associated to the current instance of the oriented edge.

      • setNext

        void setNext(IHalfEdge next)
        This function sets the next outcoming edge from the target vertex. This function is private being only invoked by the HESML code, more specifically by the taxonomy in order to preserve the consistency of the half-edge representation.
        Parameters:
        next - Next outcoming edge from the target vertex.
